algorithm_technique: Iterate through the array, calculating moves needed for each element to satisfy zigzag property based on neighbors.
problem_summary_simple: Find the minimum moves to make an array alternate between increasing and decreasing elements.
problem_summary_technical: Calculate moves for two zigzag patterns (even-indexed max, odd-indexed max) and return the minimum.
key_insights: There are two possible zigzag patterns: starting with a peak or a valley.
For each element, determine the minimum moves to satisfy the zigzag condition with its neighbors.
The minimum of the moves required for the two patterns is the answer.
